title: GB file Transfer - Free and fast file sharing
meta: Share very large files (videos, photos, PDFs, etc.) effortlessly with GB File Transfer—free, fast, and secure, with no sign-ups or registrations required.
h2: Send & Receive GB Files in Few Steps – Choose, Share Link, Download

featureHighlights.title: Quick & Easy
description: Send large files instantly with just a link or QR code—no hassle.

featureHighlights.title: 100% Free
description: No fees, no subscriptions, no accounts—just share files.

featureHighlights.title: Super Fast
description: Direct peer-to-peer transfers for maximum speed, no delays.

featureHighlights.title: Fully Secure
description: Files never touch a server, ensuring total privacy.

featureHighlights.title: No Limits
description: Send files of any size without restrictions or storage limits.

featureHighlights.title: All Devices Supported
description: Seamlessly transfer files across Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.

howTo.heading: How do I share GB files directly from any device?
steps: Upload your GB file to share on FileDropShare.
When we receive your file, we create a link and QR code in no time.
By sharing that link or QR code, your file is directly downloaded on another device.

faqs.question: Can i share GB files directly ?
faqs.answer: Yes, our service uses end-to-end encryption, allowing you to send files directly from any device without involving any server.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account to send files?
faqs.answer: No, you can send and receive files without any registration or sign-up.

faqs.question: Do I have to pay to transfer files?
faqs.answer: No, you don’t have to pay to send and receive large files. We provide an absolutely free service.

faqs.question: How many types of devices does FileDropShare support?
faqs.answer: You can send and receive large files (videos, documents, pictures, etc.) from any device, including Windows, macOS, Android, and Linux, using FileDropShare.
